instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1278: What is A1278? A1278 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook or Macbook Pro Unibody from years Late 2008, Mid 2009, Mid 2010, Early 2011, Late 2011, Mid 2012 with EMC 2254, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2327, 820-2530, 820-2879, 820-2936, 820-3115..
definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: Changing serial no. on MacBook Pro 13" 2012 (<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>) logic board - who can help?
threads.message: Hello everybody. Can anyone help with properly changing the existing serial number on a logic board for MacBook Pro 13" 2012 (<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>) - part. no. 661-6588, <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A) to another defined vaule? I would need this as a chance to recover important iMessages from the past, and would be willing to pay 200 EUR/USD for prompt and good service... preferably in EU or Germany. Thanks.

threads.title: Changing serial no. on MacBook Pro 13" 2012 (<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>) logic board - who can help?
threads.message: If you have the tools to read the SPI ROM just upload your backup and I could help you...

threads.title: Changing serial no. on MacBook Pro 13" 2012 (<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>) logic board - who can help?
threads.message:
Best in this case is to read the original BIOS from the broken board. I believe the $SVS block also needs to be copied over besides the serial number. 

In any case you need to read the BIOS chips with programmer. Or send it over to me in NL if you are not able to do it yourself.
